00035 namespace indri
00036 {
00037   namespace parse
00038   {
00039     class pagerank 
00040     {
00041     public:
00042       std::string doc;
00043       float val;
00044       int int_val;
00045       struct pagerank_greater 
00046       {
00047         bool operator() (const pagerank &one, const pagerank &two) 
00048         {
00049           if (one.val == two.val) // match previous perl script secondary sort
00050             return one.doc > two.doc;
00051           return one.val > two.val;
00052         }
00053       };
00054     };
00055     class prEntry {
00056     public:
00057       lemur::api::DOCID_T doc;
00058       float val;
00059       int int_val;
00060       struct prEntry_greater {
00061         bool operator() (const prEntry &one, const prEntry &two) {
00062           if (one.val == two.val)
00063             return one.doc > two.doc;
00064           return one.val > two.val;
00065         }
00066       };
00067     };
00068     
00069     class PageRank {
00070     private:
00071       indri::utility::Buffer _gzbuffer;
00072       gzFile _in;
00073       // from Metztler's generate_priors.pl
00074       static const double _intToProb[11];
00075       float *prTable;
00076       
00077       const std::string _corpusPath;
00078       const std::string _linkPath;
00079 
00080       double _c; // dampening parameter
00081       UINT64 _colLen; // collection length
00082 
00083       indri::collection::Repository _repository;
00084       typedef std::map< std::string, float > PageRankVector;
00085       typedef std::map< std::string, std::pair< int, std::vector< std::string > > > Links;
00086 
00087       inline void _swap( std::string& a, std::string& b ) {
00088         std::string tmp = b;
00089         b = a;
00090         a = tmp;
00091       }
00092 
00093       bool _readLine( char* beginLine );
00094

00098       void _writePageRankToFile( std::ofstream& src, const std::string& destDoc, const float pr );
00099

00102       void _updatePageRank( std::ifstream& src, std::ofstream& dest, Links& links );

00107       void _loadRanks( const std::string& dest, 
00108                        std::vector<pagerank> &pageranks);
00109       
00110     public:
00111       PageRank( const std::string& corpusPath, const std::string& linkPath, 
00112                 UINT64 colLen = 0 ) : _corpusPath( corpusPath ), 
00113                                       _linkPath( linkPath ),
00114                                       _colLen( colLen ), prTable(0) {
00115         if (_colLen == 0 ) _computeColLen();
00116       }
00117       PageRank( const std::string& corpusPath, const std::string& linkPath, 
00118                 const std::string& indexPath ) : _corpusPath( corpusPath ), 
00119                                                  _linkPath( linkPath ), prTable(0) {
00120 
00121         _repository.openRead(indexPath);
00122         indri::collection::Repository::index_state indexes = _repository.indexes();
00123         _colLen = 0;
00124         for( int i=0; i<indexes->size(); i++ ) {
00125           _colLen += (*indexes)[i]->documentCount();
00126         }
00127       }
00128       ~PageRank( ) {
00129         if( _in )
00130           gzclose( _in );
00131         delete(prTable);
00132       }
00133       
00134       void computePageRank( const std::string& outputFile, const int maxIters = 10, const int docsPerIter = 1000, const double c = 0.7 );
00135       void writeRaw( const std::string& dest, const std::string &fawFile  );
00136       void writePriors( const std::string& dest, const std::string &priorFile  );
00137       void writeRanks( const std::string& dest, const std::string &ranksFile  );
00138 
00139       void indexPageRank(const std::string& outputFile, const int maxIters = 100, const double c = 0.85 );
00140     };
